answers.author: Jayme Bosio
answers.text:
The Palm Beach County, FL, Regional Broadband Network is an inter-local program designed to promote Internet access to area non-commerical organizations, government agencies, healthcare providers, schools and social service providers. The April 2010 PBC Regional Network report profiles its participants and infrastructure. Online access: www.pbcgov.com/iss/partnering/pdf/FiberNetworkProgram.pdf

author: Toni Shope
text:
A NC Locality is looking for information on local governments that have in some way enabled local internet service providers ability to use existing infrastructure such as government buildings, water towers , etc to serve customers.    I’m looking for details on lease agreements, or even just some contacts with others that have found ways to make this work.
Thank you for sharing.
title: Enabling Local Broadband
